title: summer_high_school_information_form_fipar-s930_0104
text: SABANCI UNIVERSITY HIGH SCHOOL SUMMER SCHOOL STUDENT INFORMATION FORM Identity Information NAME SURNAME TURKISH ID NO: NATIONALITY The school you continue your education/graduated from (high school) NAME Personal Information DATE OF BIRTH (DD/MM/YYYY) GENDER (F/M) BLOOD GROUP Family Information FATHER’S NAME AND SURNAME PROFESSION MOBILE PHONE (WITH AREA CODE) MOTHER’S NAME AND SURNAME PROFESSION MOBILE PHONE (WITH AREA CODE) Address Information CORRESPONDENCE ADDRESS HOME PHONE (WITH AREA CODE) MOBILE PHONE (WITH AREA CODE) EMAIL Emergency Contacts SURNAME NAME RELATION ADDRESS HOME PHONE (WITH AREA CODE) MOBILE PHONE (WITH AREA CODE) EMAIL SIGNATURE DATE High School Summer School students must adhere to Sabancı University's security and disciplinary rules. Students may not leave the SU campus during the High School Summer School period without written parental permission. Students are expected to attend their classes. Students who fail to comply with these rules will be dismissed and will not receive a refund. I accept these rules. (This section must be filled in) FBD-S930-0104 sd
